Reviews.Title: “No Hot Water - Shut off local phone service - Fraudulent Taxi Service”

Reviews.Content: ive lived mexico city 10 am taking trip actually stayed holiday inn express hotels recent 5 night business trip mexico santa fe hotels decent santa fe world trade center wtc holiday inn express awful nights business switch 3 times twice day reason hot water checked hotel relatively built 23 couldnt tell design defect human lack maintenance error result recurring am bilingual able hotel maintenance staff confess throw floor beginning shift cold water pipes warmer water floors boiler dont cold water runs horrible figured 3rd switch infuriated manager claimed isolated sorry impossible person switch 3 times separate floors 6 7 consecutive days mishaps local free phone service tell front desk block line cant trust maids phones red flag hotel management cant trust own staff meanwhile guest struggles phone lines management sense blocked line guest checks guest functioning taxi service front hotel secure honest type service taxi exists mexico charge whatever rate provide official receipts fare illegal mexico synonymous arrangement typically hotel manager kickback comes taxi taking taxi street hotel located street minimal taxi flow worse alternative free breakfast mediocre

Reviews.Title: “Good choice if you are in this part of Mexico City”
Reviews.Author: ajnuff
Reviews.Content: extended stay hotel march 2011 hotel crowne plaza share connection lobbies location positives hotel modern decor comfortable beds friendly staff free breakfast ac nice cold negative issues metro station close shower temperature sometimes lukewarm times fluctuated scalding hot split shower head 4 inches shorter im 510 internet speed slow crawl evening

Reviews.Content: im frequent user hi franchise isnt didnt feel clean example test throw towel floor check change fresh surprise towel floor stay regarding service breakfast service poor indeed products offered low quality bad aspect chose hotel available near wtc time id commute time

Reviews.Content: hotel located wtc mexico city sightsee recommend staying holiday inn express reforma closer center historico hotel perfect price friendly staff business center internet breakfast clean returning wtc definitely recommend
